"Cortes": "That's it! That's the spirit! Let me explain what I'll have you do."
"You know, those containers that are all covered in ice. That's what your targets are this time."
"It's just, the ice they're covered in is super strong, so you can't break 'em just like that."
"You might be able to bust 'em free with one of those ramming attacks on a Floating Board, though."
"Why are the containers frozen? Not my problem!"
"Oh, I should also mention, sometimes you won't be able to find any frozen containers out there."
"The snow and ice is always blowin' about every day, uncovering and covering all sorts of stuff like that."
"If that's the case today, just wait until tomorrow. Just take it easy, there ain't no rush."
